body_html: That command uses setuptools, which installs into the site-packages directory of the Python installation that was active at the time that it was called. If you search the output for "Summary" then you should see a line for "CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX", that is where the Caffe2 libraries will be installed into. The Python source files should be in the site-packages of whichever Python you used when calling setup_caffe2.py . Some more information on how Python installations work is https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#null__how-do-python-installations-work and in the following few questions.

If you search the output for "Summary" then you should see a line for "CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX", that is where the Caffe2 libraries will be installed into.
